DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, randomized study of Summit Porocoat versus Summit DuoFix HA in total hip arthroplasty
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Comparing Two Implant Surface Finishes in Patients Undergoing Cementless Total Hip Replacement
DOC.detailed_description: Hydroxyapatite (HA) is a bioactive ceramic that resembles the natural inorganic mineral content of bone, and as such is a highly osteoconductive material. The purpose of this study is to compare an HA coated and uncoated prosthesis.
DOC.criteria: Primary total hip replacement Patient age less than or equal to 75 Sufficient bone stock to support prosthesis Previous hip replacement Significant angular/bony deformity Active joint sepsis Metal allergy Renal transplant Psychosocial disease Neurological disease/musculoskeletal disease that may affect weightbearing
